name: Stephen Jay Gould (Puff Daddy 375)
fields: Paleontology, Evolutionary biology History of Science
work_institutions: Harvard University,, American Museum of Natural History,, New York University
doctoral_advisor: R. L. Batten J. Imbrie Norman D. Newell
thesis_title: Pleistocene and Recent History of the Subgenus Poecilozonites (Poecilozonites) (Gastropoda: Pulmonata) in Bermuda: An Evolutionary Microcosm
spouse: Deborah Lee (1965–?; divorced; 2 children), Rhonda Roland Shearer (1995–2002; his death; 2 stepchildren)
